00027 KDataReader::KDataReader(const Char_t* fileName, KEvent **anEvent)
00028 {
00029         //TClass::GetClass("TBits")->IgnoreTObjectStreamer(),
00030         
00031         fLocalEvent = 0;
00032         InitializeMembers();
00033   if(!OpenFile(fileName, anEvent)){
00034                 cout << "KDataReader - Could not open " << fileName << endl;
00035         }
00036 }

00060 void KDataReader::InitializeMembers(void)
00061 {
00062   //WARNING - THIS METHOD SHOULD NEVER ALLOCATE SPACE FOR POINTERS
00063   //ONLY SET MEMBERS ON THE STACK TO THEIR INITIAL VALUES
00064         fCurrentEntry = 0;
00065         fEntries = 0;
00066         fGSEventIndex=0;
00067 }

00069 
00070 Bool_t  KDataReader::OpenFile(const Char_t* fileName, KEvent **anEvent)
00071 {
00072         Close();  //close the file, if one is already open. 
00073         fFile = OpenFileForReading(fileName);
00074         Bool_t theRet = false;
00075         
00076         if(fFile != 0){
00077                 if(fTree != 0){
00078                         if(SetBranchAddress(anEvent)){
00079                                 if(GetEntry(0) > 0)
00080                                         fEntries = fTree->GetEntries();
00081                                         theRet = true;
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084         }
00085 
00086         return theRet;
00087 }
00088 
00089 Bool_t KDataReader::Close(Option_t *opt)
00090 {
00091         return this->KDataFileIO::Close(opt);
00092         if(fLocalEvent!=0) {
00093                 KEventFactory::DeleteEvent(fLocalEvent);
00094                 fLocalEvent = 0;
00095         }
00096                 
00097 }
00098 
00099 Bool_t KDataReader::SetBranchAddress(KEvent **anEvent)
00100 {
00101         if(fTree == 0) return false;
00102         
00103         if(anEvent == 0){ 
00104                 TBranchElement *fBranch = (TBranchElement *)fTree->GetBranch(GetBranchName().c_str());
00105                 if(fBranch == 0) return false;
00106                 
00107                 fLocalEvent = KEventFactory::NewEvent(fBranch->GetClassName());
00108                 if(fLocalEvent != 0)
00109                         fTree->SetBranchAddress(GetBranchName().c_str(), &fLocalEvent);
00110                 else 
00111                         return false; 
00112         }
00113         else 
00114                 fTree->SetBranchAddress(GetBranchName().c_str(), anEvent);
00115         
00116         return true;
00117         
00118 }
00119 
00120 KEvent* KDataReader::GetEvent(void)
00121 {
00122         KEvent* event = 0;
00123         if(fTree !=0){
00124                 if(!fTree->IsZombie())
00125                 {
00126                         TBranchElement *fB = (TBranchElement *)fTree->GetBranch(GetBranchName().c_str());
00127                         event = (KEvent *)fB->GetObject();
00128                 }
00129         }
00130         
00131         return event;
00132 }
00133 
00134 Int_t KDataReader::GetNextEntry(void)
00135 {
00136         return GetEntry(fCurrentEntry+1);
00137 }
00138 
00139 Int_t KDataReader::GetPreviousEntry(void)
00140 {
00141         return  GetEntry(fCurrentEntry-1);
00142 }
00143 
00144 Int_t KDataReader::GetEntry(Int_t anEntry)
00145 {
00146         //will load Entry number 'anEntry' and 
00147         //if successful, will set the fCurrentEntry value to
00148         //anEntry.
00149         
00150         Int_t theRet = -1;
00151         if(fTree == 0) {
00152                 fCurrentEntry = 0;
00153                 return -1;
00154         }
00155         else {
00156                 theRet = fTree->GetEntry(anEntry);
00157                 if(theRet > 0) 
00158                         fCurrentEntry = anEntry;
00159                 
00160                 return theRet;
00161         }
00162 }
00163 
00164 Int_t KDataReader::GetEntryWithGSEventNumber(Int_t anEntry)
00165 {
00166         if(fGSEventIndex==0){
00167                 cout << "Building index..." << endl;
00168                 fTree->BuildIndex("fGSEventNumber");
00169                 fGSEventIndex=1;
00170         }
00171         
00172         //will load (if possible) Entry cooresponding to GSEventNumber'anEntry' and 
00173         //if successful, will set the fCurrentEntry value to
00174         //anEntry. Otherwise returnvalue should be -1.
00175         
00176         Int_t theRet = -1;
00177         if(fTree == 0) {
00178                 fCurrentEntry = 0;
00179                 return -1;
00180         }
00181         else {
00182                 theRet = fTree->GetEntryWithIndex(anEntry);
00183                 if(theRet > 0) 
00184                         fCurrentEntry = fTree->GetEntryNumberWithIndex(anEntry);
00185                 
00186                 return theRet;
00187         }
00188 }

00190 void KDataReader::ls(Option_t *anOpt) const
00191 {
00192         if(fFile != 0){
00193                 fFile->ls(anOpt);
00194         }
00195         
00196 }
00197 
00198 TObject* KDataReader::Get(const Char_t* namecycle) const
00199 {
00200         if(fFile != 0){
00201                 return fFile->Get(namecycle);
00202         }
00203         else return 0;
00204 }

00206 //anEntry has to be the entry number for the allBolosVetoFile it is the same as GSEventNumber, but not for skimmed files
00207 Int_t KDataReader::GetNextMuonEntry(Int_t anEntry) 
00208 {
00209         Int_t size=0;
00210         KHLAEvent* e=0;
00211         e = dynamic_cast<KHLAEvent*>(GetEvent());
00212         if(e==0)return -1;
00213         
00214         if(anEntry<0){
00215                 size=GetNextEntry();
00216         }
00217         else{
00218                 size=GetEntry(anEntry+1);
00219         }
00220         while(size>0 && e->GetNumMuonModules()==0){
00221         size=GetNextEntry();
00222         }
00223         return size;
00224 }
00225 
00226 Int_t KDataReader::GetPreviousMuonEntry(Int_t anEntry) 
00227 {
00228         Int_t size=0;
00229         KHLAEvent* e=0;
00230         e = dynamic_cast<KHLAEvent*>(GetEvent());
00231         if(e==0)return -1;
00232         if(anEntry<0)
00233                 size=GetPreviousEntry();
00234         else
00235                 size=GetEntry(anEntry-1);
00236         while(size>0 && e->GetNumMuonModules()==0){
00237         size=GetPreviousEntry();
00238         }
00239         return size;
00240 }
